name: Room Air Conditioner
description: $90 discount on Energy Star-certified room air conditioner

whatTheyOffer:

- No rebate forms to submit
- Must be Energy Star certified
- Portable and window units eligible

- Automatic discount at register
howToGetIt:
1. Find participating retailer on website
2. Shop for Energy Star-certified room AC
3. Discount applied automatically at checkout
4. No paperwork or forms required
5. Take unit home same day
6. Save on cooling costs with efficient model
